data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Dhi-Qar an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dhi-Qar, Iraq
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Dhi-Qar, Iraq.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Dhi-Qar.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Dhi-Qar who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Arab, North Iraqi people. 0.2% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Dhi-Qar, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Dhi-Qar to exponentially multiply disciples.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Dhi-Qar, Iraq. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
